name: Castlevania - Hell's Lullaby
description:
Face the dark force of Dracula once again in this Castlevania fan game.

Set years later the events of Castlevania 3 - Dracula's Curse, embark in this adventure alone or with a friend in local multiplayer impersonating Trevor Belmont or his son Evan Belmont.

This game is a tribute to the old style NES Castlevania games, and was made for a jam on the Game Maker Italy Discord Channel
